text: The Order of Vanuatu has four grades. * "Badge of Honour". * "Badge of Distinction". * The "Vanuatu Distinguished Service Medal". * The "Vanuatu Meritorious Service Medal". Every grade in this order has another ribbon, each in the colours red-green-yellow and black. The New Hebrides, a French-British condominium became independent in 1980. In 1988 the government of Vanuatu founded a single order of merit. ==External links== * Ribbons on Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Vanuatu Category:Awards established in 1988 Category:1988 establishments in Oceania
